name: WindowsDevicePortal
description:
A black & red theme for the Windows Device Portal.
To activate the Windows Device Portal, go to 
-Settings > Update & Security > For developers
-Activate Developer Mode
-Enable Device Portal
->https://localhost:50443/
additional_info:
Version 1.0.0
-optimized for Performance-Tab only

Version 1.0.1
-shorter code
-created regex for applies-to
	(applies to al local sites running on Port 50443)
-removed blue color from Main-Menu
